moa.classifiers.trees

Class ORTO.ORTOPerceptron

  • java.lang.Object
    • moa.AbstractMOAObject
      • moa.classifiers.trees.ORTO.ORTOPerceptron
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, MOAObject
    Enclosing class:
    ORTO

    public static class ORTO.ORTOPerceptron
extends AbstractMOAObject
    A Perceptron classifier modified to conform to the specifications of Ikonomovska et al.
    See Also:
